job_description: The Opportunity The Western Australian Aboriginal Child Health Survey (WAACHS) Linked Data Study is a partnership between researchers, the Aboriginal community and government to provide evidence for policy and practice addressing high priority health and wellbeing issues for Aboriginal children and families. We now have an exciting opportunity for a Data Analyst to join this high achieving team and support a range of sub-studies outlined by study investigators and the Aboriginal Steering Committee. Carry out statistical analysis ranging from exploratory & descriptive analysis through to complex longitudinal modelling. Ensure that all analyses and reporting meet Aboriginal research standards, is culturally sensitive and consistent with the overarching study narrative.
